modules.description: This module enables the development of SMTP filtering applications through callback-driven handling of mail transaction stages like connection setup, envelope commands, and message content processing. It operates on milter contexts (`ctx`) to manipulate email headers, envelope senders/recipients, and message bodies, while interacting with status codes (`stat`), feature flags (`flag`), and protocol stages (`stage`) to enforce filtering rules. Common use cases include content modification during transmission, spam/virus filtering, and dynamic macro-based policy enforcement via subscription mechanisms.
